/** @format */ import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox'; function AddFarm(props) { const [farmType, setFarmType] = useState(''); const [numOfStock, setNumOfStock] = useState(''); const [farmDays, setFarmDays] = useState(''); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(farmType, numOfStock, farmDays); }; return ( <>
